class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.Institute
class.query: select institute.id, count(distinct user.id) from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.Institute institute inner join institute.users user where institute.id in (:instituteIds) group by institute.id
class.sql-query:
select 'site' as entityName, count(s.identifier) as count from catissue_site s inner join catissue_institution i on i.identifier = s.institute_id where s.activity_status != 'Disabled' and i.activity_status != 'Disabled' and i.identifier = :instituteId
union all
select 'user' as entityName, count(u.identifier) as count from catissue_user u inner join catissue_institution i on i.identifier = u.institute_id where u.activity_status != 'Disabled' and i.activity_status != 'Disabled' and i.identifier = :instituteId
